thread.title: Clarks Drapes Silky Veg Tan Leather Over 5 of Its Best Silhouettes
thread.title_full: Clarks Drapes Silky Veg Tan Leather Over 5 of Its Best Silhouettes

author: Daniel Pearson
title: Clarks Drapes Silky Veg Tan Leather Over 5 of Its Best Silhouettes
text:
Previous Next 
Clarks has draped veg tan leather across five of its most popular footwear silhouettes, including the Desert Boot, Wallabee, Desert Trek, Weaver, and Trigenic Flex. 
Releasing as part of the brand’s SS17 lineup, the “Veg Tan” pack once again highlights the smooth and silky benefits of using vegetable-tanned leather and suede on smarter, more refined styles. The color sits somewhere between beige and pink, and will age beautifully under sunlight and after general wear and tear. 
The Clark “Veg Tan” collection will release over at the brand’s online store in the coming weeks. 
In other footwear news, Feature and Saucony reunite for a mouth-watering “Belgian Waffle” sneaker .
